page.title: 07Clubs and Societies -Ropley
page.content: There are many clubs and societies in the area which provide activities for a wide range of ages and interests. For sporting people there are cricket, football,bowls and tennis clubs which play at the recreation ground.The Dramatic Society has a production in November and March and social events throughout the year.Gardeners can join the Horticultural Society and those who enjoy poetry can join a group that meets each month.Ladies can find interest and friendship in the W.I.,at Ropley and West Tisted and also in the Housewives Register.There is a Mother and Toddler Group which meets in the Coffee Room and a Playgroup in the Parish Hall for the slightly older pre school children. There is also a baby sitting circle.For the OAPs there is the Good Companions Club and the St. Peters Fellowship.
